name: Squish that Orange
description:
You like talking to snakes? You like eating oranges? You like using compassion and kindness to bring colour to the world and make it a better place? Well, that's the game for you then!

Controls:

Movement - WASD
Interact - Space
Sprint - Left Shift

Credits:

Albin Nilsson - Programmer / 3D
Yoana Georgieva - 2D / 3D artist
Morgana Alexandra Valerie Weichelt - Orange Squisher
Mikkel Zoffmann - Game / Level and Sound Designer
Daria Radu - Programmer
Oriol Comas Llurià - Programmer
